history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: tarski_lfp_least. qsimpl time: 1 use: tarski_lfp_least,tarski_gfp_fixed. qsimpl time: 1 use: poset_refl,tarski_lfp_least,tarski_gfp_fixed.

exceptions.exn: In environment T : lattice f : T -> T x : T Hfx : f x = x Unable to unify "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class T) in mx_leq) (tarski_lfp ?M1464) ?M1465" with "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class T) in mx_leq) x (tarski_gfp f)".

In environment T : lattice H : forall (f : T -> T) (x : T), f x = x -> tarski_lfp f <== x f : T -> T x : T Hfx : f x = x Unable to unify "?M1629 (tarski_gfp ?M1629) = tarski_gfp ?M1629" with "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class T) in mx_leq) (f x) (tarski_gfp f)".

In environment T : lattice H1 : forall f : T -> T, monotone f -> f (tarski_gfp f) = tarski_gfp f H0 : forall (f : T -> T) (x : T), f x = x -> tarski_lfp f <== x f : T -> T x : T Hfx : f x = x Unable to unify "tarski_gfp f" with "f x".

original: intros x Hfx. apply tarski_lfp_least. rewrite <- Hfx. apply tarski_gfp_fixed. apply poset_refl.
